title: Joao22
author: Joao22
content: Recently I realized that I like to program something new for the Internet and I started looking for information about cryptocurrency technologies. The article about ethereum smart contract audit helped me a lot, because it contains useful information about the technology for creating smart contracts and maintaining them from working capacity, you can learn more about this here. http://www.polkadotflorist.co.uk/2022/06/how-to-audit-an-ethereum-smart-contract/
